name: InternetLimitada
description: Simule sua internet limitada hoje mesmo!

scripts.build-chrome: mkdirp dist/chrome && browserify -e src/index.js -r ./src/browser/chrome/browser.js:browser -o dist/chrome/index.js -d && cpr resources/shared dist/chrome && cpr resources/chrome dist/chrome && svg2png resources/shared/wifi.svg --output=dist/chrome/wifi19.png --width=19 --height=19
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run build-chrome
